item.title: Corey Taylor
item.description: Corey Todd Taylor is an American singer, songwriter, actor and author and publisher. He is known as the lead vocalist and lyricist of the bands Slipknot and Stone Sour.

item.title: Jim Root
item.description: James Donald Root, also known by his number #4, is an American musician, songwriter, and guitarist. He is one of two guitarists for the American heavy metal band Slipknot, and the former lead guitarist for the American alternative metal band Stone Sour.
